basics.name: </ Shohanul Alam >
basics.label: { Web Application Developer }
basics.summary: Passionate self-taught Web Application Developer. Love to code with JavaScript, Php and Python. Expertise in both front-end and back-end framworks and libraries like Bootstrap, Codeigniter, JQuery, Ajax and also interested in Django and Laravel.  Currently I am researching and learning to become an Advanced Javascript Developer and studying over different frameworks like Angular.Js and Node.js. I prefer working in the back-end though I have a good grasp over the front-end part.

work.summary: Ekkdam.com is a multi-platform technology company based on JavaScript stack
highlights: Building web and mobile Application api that uses to make shopping business deals automated, team lead successfully won Microsoft's Elite Membership, creating node.js api that can be used in both web and mobile platforms, handling the front-end section using Facebook's react-native framework

work.summary: Maison Mahdil is a front-end based web design focused service
highlights: Handling front-end and back-end of Web Applications, using Google, Facebook and others provided api, integration of Google's Firebase platform

work.summary: Maison Mahdil is a front-end purposed technology company
